title: Torque - why 2F0 results in greater torque than F0

content.question: Two pulley wheels are rigidly connected so that they can rotate together around a common center, as shown in the figure. One student pulls downward on the smaller wheel’s string with a force of magnitude <math alttext="F sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> exerted a vertical distance <math alttext="L sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> below the wheels’ center.
